description:
A mountain grannie repays those who are kind to her. A child prodigy is banished far from the capital.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mountain Granny Shrine / Sugawara Michizane and the Legend of the Flying Plum
Yamanba Dou / Sugawara Michizane to Tobiume Densetsu
やまんば堂 / 菅原道真と飛梅伝説
